body_html:
I doubt we'd add official support, given our Scala bench isn't very deep. However, we'd be excited to link to Scala bindings from tensorflow.org.
…
On Jul 17, 2017 14:30, "Tianhao Li" ***@***.***> wrote: That's really good, thanks. We have community version of Scala GRPC and now we have Scala API for tensorflow. body_text:
I doubt we'd add official support, given our Scala bench isn't very deep.
However, we'd be excited to link to Scala bindings from tensorflow.org.
…
On Jul 17, 2017 14:30, "Tianhao Li" ***@***.***> wrote:
 That's really good, thanks.

 We have community version of Scala GRPC and now we have Scala API for
 tensorflow.

 Hopefully Google could add those as official support.

 —

body:
I doubt we'd add official support, given our Scala bench isn't very deep.
However, we'd be excited to link to Scala bindings from tensorflow.org.

On Jul 17, 2017 14:30, "Tianhao Li" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> That's really good, thanks.
>
> We have community version of Scala GRPC and now we have Scala API for
> tensorflow.
>
> Hopefully Google could add those as official support.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
